column5: Sorry I looked for it, but couldnt find it.  Todays BPS Vaugan flyer, has it  on sale. Well, as sale as it is.  $47.00.    Hope this helps anyone looking.
I have a brand new one that I sell for less.  I am in Scarborough if anyone is interested in it.
would be nice to have those included with new models instead of waiting for the cables to break, forcing owners to purchase these at an inflated cost.

would be nice to have those included with new models instead of waiting for the cables to break, forcing owners to purchase these at an inflated cost.  Ya I would make my own. I just posted for those that were looking that dont have the means to make their own.
yep. brake cables work really well for that purpose.
